name: dt-architecture-artifacts
description: Architecture artifacts markdown editor with glassmorphism theme

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run watcher:dev" --ignore 'content/*' --ignore 'content-templates/*'
scripts.dev:dev: NODE_ENV=development  concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.dev:prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run server:prod" "npm run client:prod"
scripts.client:prod: cd client && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.watcher: cd client-watcher && node src/index.js watch --config watcher.config.json
scripts.watcher:dev: cd client-watcher && nodemon src/index.js watch --config watcher.config.json --verbose
scripts.watcher:start: cd client-watcher && node src/index.js watch --config watcher.config.json
scripts.watcher:test: cd client-watcher && node src/index.js test --config watcher.config.json
scripts.watcher:sync: cd client-watcher && node src/index.js sync --config watcher.config.json
scripts.electron: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "cd client-electron && npm run electron-dev"
scripts.install-deps: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client-electron && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client-extensions/vscode && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client-watcher && npm install --legacy-peer-deps

author: Stephen Booysen
